text: The 2015–16 La Liga season (known as the Liga BBVA for sponsorship reasons) is the 85th since its establishment. Barcelona are the defending champions. The season started on 22 August 2015 and will conclude on 15 May 2016. ==League table== ===Standings=== Pos Team Pld W D L GF GA GD Pts Qualification or relegation 1 Barcelona (C) 38 29 4 5 112 29 +83
